test_cases.title: Joining the loyalty program for rewards
steps: Click on the loyalty program link
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined the loyalty program and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Error: Invalid email address
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined the loyalty program and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Error: Missing required information
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined the loyalty program and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Edge case: Multiple accounts
steps: Submit the application form for each account
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined all loyalty programs and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Edge case: No email address provided
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined the loyalty program and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Edge case: Invalid password
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined the loyalty program and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Edge case: No account created
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined the loyalty program and can start earning rewards.

test_cases.title: Edge case: Multiple accounts with same email address
steps: Multiple accounts with same email address
Submit the application form for each account
test_cases.expected_result: You have successfully joined all loyalty programs and can start earning rewards.
